title: S3
description: Amazon S3 and S3-compatible storage providers (46 providers supported)

oneOf.title: China Mobile Ecloud Elastic Object Storage (EOS)

env_auth.title: Use Environment Auth
env_auth.description: Get AWS credentials from runtime (environment variables or EC2/ECS meta data)

access_key_id.title: Access Key ID
access_key_id.description: AWS Access Key ID. Leave blank for anonymous access or runtime credentials

secret_access_key.title: Secret Access Key
secret_access_key.description: AWS Secret Access Key (password). Leave blank for anonymous access or runtime credentials

session_token.title: Session Token
session_token.description: AWS Session Token for temporary credentials

location_constraint.title: Location Constraint
location_constraint.description: Location constraint - must match the Region. Used when creating buckets only

acl.title: Canned ACL
acl.description: Canned ACL used when creating buckets and storing or copying objects

bucket_acl.title: Bucket ACL
bucket_acl.description: Canned ACL used when creating buckets. If empty, acl is used instead

sse_kms_key_id.title: KMS Key ID
sse_kms_key_id.description: If using KMS ID you must provide the ARN of Key

sse_customer_key_base64.title: SSE-C Key (Base64)
sse_customer_key_base64.description: Secret encryption key in base64 format for SSE-C

storage_class.title: Storage Class
storage_class.description: Storage class to use when storing new objects

upload_cutoff.title: Upload Cutoff
upload_cutoff.description: Cutoff for switching to chunked upload. Maximum is 5GB

max_upload_parts.title: Max Upload Parts
max_upload_parts.description: Maximum number of parts in a multipart upload

copy_cutoff.title: Copy Cutoff
copy_cutoff.description: Cutoff for switching to multipart copy

disable_checksum.title: Disable Checksum
disable_checksum.description: Don't store MD5 checksum with object metadata

shared_credentials_file.title: Shared Credentials File
shared_credentials_file.description: Path to the shared credentials file

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: Profile to use in the shared credentials file

force_path_style.title: Force Path Style
force_path_style.description: Use path style access instead of virtual hosted style

use_accelerate_endpoint.title: Use Accelerate Endpoint
use_accelerate_endpoint.description: Use AWS S3 Transfer Acceleration endpoint

leave_parts_on_error.title: Leave Parts on Error
leave_parts_on_error.description: Don't delete incomplete multipart uploads on error

requester_pays.title: Requester Pays
requester_pays.description: Enable requester pays option when interacting with S3 bucket

location_constraint.title: Location Constraint
location_constraint.description: Location constraint - must match the Region. Used when creating buckets only. Leave empty for us-east-1.

oneOf.title: Empty for US Region, Northern Virginia, or Pacific Northwest
Auto (R2 automatically distributes across Cloudflare data centers)

endpoint.title: Ceph Endpoint
endpoint.description: URL of your Ceph Object Storage server

oneOf.title: US Cross Region Washington DC Private
US Cross Region San Jose Private
APAC Cross Regional Hong Kong Private

location_constraint.title: Location Constraint
location_constraint.description: Location constraint for IBM COS buckets

force_path_style.title: Force Path Style
force_path_style.description: IBM COS requires path style access

endpoint.title: SeaweedFS Endpoint
endpoint.description: URL of your SeaweedFS S3 server

oneOf.title: Use this if unsure. Will use v4 signatures and an empty region.
Use this only if v4 signatures don't work. E.g. pre Jewel/v10 CEPH.

endpoint.title: Endpoint
endpoint.description: Endpoint for your S3 compatible provider

force_path_style.title: Force Path Style
force_path_style.description: Use path style access instead of virtual hosted style

v2_auth.title: Use V2 Auth
v2_auth.description: Use AWS v2 authentication (signature v2) - required for some older S3 implementations

force_path_style.title: Force Path Style
force_path_style.description: China Mobile requires path style access

endpoint.title: Exaba Endpoint
endpoint.description: URL of your Exaba Object Storage server

endpoint.title: FlashBlade Endpoint
endpoint.description: URL of your Pure Storage FlashBlade Object Storage server

force_path_style.title: Force Path Style
force_path_style.description: FlashBlade supports vhost but defaults to path-style

endpoint.title: Hetzner Endpoint
endpoint.description: Replace 'your-objectstorage.com' with your actual Hetzner object storage endpoint

endpoint.title: Netease Endpoint
endpoint.description: URL of your Netease Object Storage server

endpoint.title: Rclone S3 Server Endpoint
endpoint.description: URL of your Rclone S3 server

force_path_style.title: Force Path Style
force_path_style.description: Rclone S3 server requires path style access

endpoint.title: SpectraLogic Endpoint
endpoint.description: URL of your Spectra Logic BlackPearl server

$comment: S3 backend supports 46 providers. Provider-specific fields (region, endpoint, storage_class) use oneOf with const/title for clean dropdown generation. The dependencies section conditionally shows appropriate fields based on selected provider.
